page.title: 10SeniorCitizens AppletonWiske
page.content: 15 Pensioners live in the council bungalows.25 live in private houses 6 of these are married couples 15 families own cars.Mrs Heather Thornton of 2 Front Street is the warden for the 11 pensioners bungalows.She visits each pensioner daily and makes sure that they are comfortable or if they need a doctor.There is an alarm from the bungalows to her home so that she can be contacted in an emergency.The bungalows have a bedroom, lounge, kitchen, pantry and a combined bathroom with wc.Rent is Â£22 a week.They have oil_fired central heating and an open fire. Over 60's can attend the Tuesday club at the village Hall,Which they run themselves.At the club they can play Crown Bowls,cards or dominoes,join in the raffle or just sit and chat with their freinds over tea or coffee.
